original: @76b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @76b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: na pa kum ku ma sta ba /
analyzed: na pa kum ku ma sta ba /
translated: Napakumkumastava

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gur kum gzhon nu lta bu'i bstod pa //
analyzed: gur kum gzhon nu lta bu'i bstod pa //
translated: Praise of Youthful Saffron

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Manjushri.üîΩYour body has the radiance of youthful saffron

original: gur gum gzhon nu'i ge sar mdangs 'dra'i sku //
analyzed: gur gum gzhon nu'i ge sar mdangs 'dra'i sku //
translated: petals,üîΩand you are especially attached to and devoted to

original: lhag par chags shing mos pa 'dzin 'di ni //
analyzed: lhag par chags shing mos pa 'dzin 'di ni //
translated: this.

original: 'gro ba rjes su chags pas 'dul gzigs nas //
analyzed: 'gro ba rjes su chags pas 'dul gzigs nas //
translated: Seeing that beings are to be tamed through attachment,

original: thugs rje nyid kyis gzhan gyi dbang du bzung //
analyzed: thugs rje nyid kyis gzhan gyi dbang du bzung //
translated: you are taken under the power of others through compassion.

original: char sprin gzhon dang zla ba lta bu'i zhal //
analyzed: char sprin gzhon dang zla ba lta bu'i zhal //
translated: Your face is like a youthful rain cloud or the moon,

original: gnyis kyi bar na gnas pa rab mdzes pa //üîΩ'char kha'i nyi ma'i zer gyis phog pa yi //
analyzed: gnyis kyi bar na gnas pa rab mdzes pa // 'char kha'i nyi ma'i zer gyis phog pa yi //
translated: very beautiful between the two.üîΩYour playful face is like a golden lotus

original: gser gyi padma lta bu rol pa'i zhal //üîΩthub pa yan lag dri med rin chen brgyas //
analyzed: gser gyi padma lta bu rol pa'i zhal // thub pa yan lag dri med rin chen brgyas //
translated: touched by the rays of the rising sun.üîΩThe stainless limbs of the Sage are adorned

original: brgyan cing yid 'od 'od zer rab 'phro ba //
analyzed: brgyan cing yid 'od 'od zer rab 'phro ba //
translated: with a hundred jewels and radiate beautiful light rays.üîΩYou hold above your crown,

original: char sprin gzhon nu glog gis bskor 'dras ni //üîΩspras pa khyod kyi cod pan steng na 'dzin //
analyzed: char sprin gzhon nu glog gis bskor 'dras ni //üîΩspras pa khyod kyi cod pan steng na 'dzin //
translated: adorned with a youthful rain cloud encircled by lightning,

original: 'char kha'i zer gyis padma dmar phog pa'i //
analyzed: 'char kha'i zer gyis padma dmar phog pa'i //
translated: Your body is the basis for the signs and ornaments of virtue,

original: @77a * // mdangs 'dra dge ba'i mtshan dang rgyan gyi gzhi //
analyzed: @77a * // mdangs 'dra dge ba'i mtshan dang rgyan gyi gzhi //
translated: like a red lotus struck by the rays of the rising sun.üîΩIn your hands you hold a sword, arrows,

original: khyod kyi phyag na ral gri mda' dag dang // autpal sngon po dang ni gzhu dag 'dzin //
analyzed: khyod kyi phyag na ral gri mda' dag dang // autpal sngon po dang ni gzhu dag 'dzin //
translated: a blue utpala flower, and a bow.

original: khyod kyi 'od kyi phung pos phyogs mtshams su //
analyzed: khyod kyi 'od kyi phung pos phyogs mtshams su //
translated: Your mass of light

original: thub rnams rab skyed yon tan rab rgyas byas //
analyzed: thub rnams rab skyed yon tan rab rgyas byas //
translated: generates the sages and causes their qualities to flourish.

original: yang yang rab 'phros yang yang rab bsdus pas //
analyzed: yang yang rab 'phros yang yang rab bsdus pas //
translated: Again and again it radiates and again and again it gathers,

original: gdul bya'i blo yi ma rig mun pa 'joms //
analyzed: gdul bya'i blo yi ma rig mun pa 'joms //
translated: destroying the darkness of ignorance in the minds of those to be tamed.

original: bcom ldan srid pa'i 'jigs pa sel mdzad la //
analyzed: bcom ldan srid pa'i 'jigs pa sel mdzad la //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn, who clears away the fears of existence,

original: tshad med mchi mas mig brlan bkang byas nas //
analyzed: tshad med mchi mas mig brlan bkang byas nas //
translated: his eyes filled with immeasurable tears,

original: thal sbyar spyi btud pa spu langs pa yis //
analyzed: thal sbyar spyi btud pa spu langs pa yis //
translated: with palms joined, head bowed, and body hair standing on end,

original: thugs rje can la mos pas gus phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: thugs rje can la mos pas gus phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage with devotion to the compassionate one.

original: srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bsdams 'gro gsum po //
analyzed: srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bsdams 'gro gsum po //
translated: The three realms of migrators are bound by the suffering of existence,

original: thugs rje chen pos 'grel bar mdzad pa la //
analyzed: thugs rje chen pos 'grel bar mdzad pa la //
translated: but the great compassionate one liberates them.

original: lus dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal dag dang yang //
analyzed: lus dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal dag dang yang //
translated: With body and speech I pay homage and praiseüîΩto the one who is the sole friend of migrators.

original: phyag 'tshal yid kyis gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal yid kyis gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage with my mind, I pay homage with devotion.

original: khyod 'bangs skye bo skyabs gzhan ma mchis pas //
analyzed: khyod 'bangs skye bo skyabs gzhan ma mchis pas //
translated: You are the refuge of the people who have no other refuge.

original: 'di ni yang dang yang du slong lags so //
analyzed: 'di ni yang dang yang du slong lags so //
translated: This is what I ask of you again and again.

original: bdag ni skye ba skye bar mgon khyod la //
analyzed: bdag ni skye ba skye bar mgon khyod la //
translated: In birth after birth, I go for refuge to you, O protector.

original: skyabs su mchi yis srid pa'i sdug bsngal sol //
analyzed: skyabs su mchi yis srid pa'i sdug bsngal sol //
translated: Remove the suffering of existence.

original: gur gum gzhon nu lta bu'i bstod pa /
analyzed: gur gum gzhon nu lta bu'i bstod pa /
translated: The Praise of the Youthful Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´

original: slob dpon seng ge mi g-yo bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon seng ge mi g-yo bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: The Indian preceptor Dipamkarabhadra and the great editor and translator, the monk Tshul khrims rgyal ba, translated and finalized this.
